title: I Possessed a Reverse Harem Novel - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Mature   Romance   Smut
tags: An*l   Adultery   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Half-human Protagonist   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Master-Servant Relationship   Mature Protagonist   Mythical Beasts   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse Harem   S*xual Cultivation Technique   Threesome   Transmigration   Witches
author: 백소나
description:
I possessed the heroine in a reverse harem novel, where there was no such thing as skinship.

But was this an R19 novel?

In the original story, the heroine, a wizardess, helps various male characters with her magic and is loved by them.

But when I actually possessed the novel, in order to increase my mana, I had to consume the men’s energy.

Also, the men I helped cling to me to ‘eat’ them……?

Wasn’t this novel for all ages?>
